basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a graduate degree in Educational Leadership. Eligibility Requirements Must be pursuing a graduate degree in Educational Leadership Minimum 3.25 GPA Former/present/currently certified as a Oklahoma teacher/counselor Nationally Board Certified preferred, not required Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
